opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Rockwell International Corp. v. United States

opinion:
548 U.S. 941 (2006)

ROCKWELL INTERNATIONAL CORP. ET AL.
v.
UNITED STATES ET AL.

No. 05-1272.

Supreme Court of United States.

September 26, 2006

Certiorari granted limited to Question 1 presented by the petition. Petitioners' brief to be filed with the Clerk and served upon opposing counsel on or before 3 p.m., Thursday, October 26, 2006. Respondents' brief to be filed with the Clerk and served upon opposing counsel on or before 3 p.m., Monday, November 20, 2006. The reply brief, if any, to be filed with the Clerk and served upon opposing counsel on or before 3 p.m., Monday, November 27, 2006. JUSTICE BREYER took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
